title: Suzy  Simone in The Perfect Lunch
description: An alternate cover edition exists here.This is the 5th book in the Suzy Q. Stories short story series. The date for this lunch was made while in the Piano Room in the 2nd book for of the series "Suzy & Kelly, in Lessons in Love". For those that haven't read the 2nd book of the series, Suzy has a painting that she has acquired and know that her friend, and sister art dealer, will immediately fall in love with the piece, just as she did, This is the business reason for the lunch date, while the real reason for the lunch date is that Simone has wanted Suzy for years, and now that Suzy has come out of the closet, there is no secret for the real reason for the lunch, and both of the women are highly anticipating; the sale of the painting, lunch, and of course the desert to follow.
author: D.D. Story
